alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued May 27 at 3:06AM EDT until May 28 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents and rough surf expected. * WHERE...Coastal Indian River, Coastal Saint Lucie, Coastal Martin, Mainland Southern Brevard and Southern Brevard Barrier Islands Counties. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Rip currents are powerful channels of water flowing quickly away from shore, which occur most often at low spots or breaks in the sandbar and in the vicinity of structures such as jetties and piers. Heed the advice of lifeguards, beach patrol flags and signs. Entering the surf is not advised.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
